text: phir isamen shaq nahin ki tumhaara paravaradigaar un logon ko jinhone museebat mein mubtila hone ka baad ghar baar chhode fir (khuda kee raah mein) jihaad kie aur takaleephon par sabr kiya isamen shaq nahin ki tumhaara paravaradigaar in sab baaton ke baad alabatta bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
